name: Spellbrush
headline: Making Anime Real
description:
Here at Spellbrush, we're passionate about making a good anime game.

We also happen to be the world's leading generative AI studio — we're the team behind niji・journey.

We are currently investigating how AI can be used to help human artists perform masterpieces in the most complex medium of our times: video games.

Our games are characterized by a no-compromise approach to well-balanced gameplay married to a truthful love of visual arts.

founders.name: Cory Li, Founder
founders.description:
ceo of making anime real @ spellbrush (w18).
previously benchling (s12) & bioengineering @mit.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Spellbrush**

Founded in 2018 and based in San Francisco, Spellbrush might just be your next favorite gaming studio. With a mission centered on "Making Anime Real," they’re not just another development team; they are a pioneering force in the generative AI landscape. They're the creative minds behind niji・journey, a standout project that's already making waves in the anime and gaming communities.

At its core, Spellbrush is committed to enhancing the artistic side of gaming. They believe that video games are one of the most intricate mediums of our time, blending storytelling, design, and emotional engagement. Their approach is a no-compromise one, ensuring that gameplay is not only balanced but also suffused with a genuine love for visual arts. This dual commitment to art and functionality is what sets them apart in a crowded space.

Their team consists of 28 talented individuals, and they’ve benefited from the mentorship of Y Combinator, having participated in the W18 batch. Their expertise spans across artificial intelligence, deep learning, and—most importantly—generative AI applied to gaming.

🌟 **Key Projects**:
- **Niji Journey**: A transformative experience offering magical anime pictures.
- **Waifu Labs**: A hands-on approach to generating stunning anime portraits.
- **Arrowmancer**: Witches in space—enough said.
- **Cake Duel**: A game that lets you indulge your sweet tooth in a fun, competitive setting.

With a group partner like Nan guiding them, Spellbrush is positioned to redefine gaming experiences through technology and artistry.

For a deeper dive into what they’re up to, check out their [website](https://spellbrush.com) and explore their projects that mix the enchanting world of anime with advanced technology. If you’re intrigued by the intersection of creativity and AI, Spellbrush might just be the studio to watch in the coming years.
